channel.title: Sebastian K. Müller
channel.description: Recent content on Sebastian K. Müller

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! Ciao! Servus! Let me introduce myself here at length. I was born in March 1987 with some roots in the mountaieous region of the Bavarian forest, with the middle name Karl, and grew up in the peaceful town Gündlkofen in the Isar valley. Tennis courts, ski slopes and forests were the playgrounds of my childhood. After my high school degree I engaged in a 9-month civil service in a hospital, but chose to study physics.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email Address: Sebastian Müller Via Dei Giacinti 24 34135 Trieste

item.title: Photos
item.description: I take my camera anywhere and I use it respectfully anytime. I’m not shy of shooting mountain nor animals. I here share a few of my favourites from recent adventures in the surroundings.

item.title: Science
item.description: Peer-reviewed Publications: Müller, Sebastian K., et al. “The climate change response of alpine-mediterranean heavy precipitation events.” Climate Dynamics (2023): 1-22. (https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/e3ge1i39nw9pzalqa6mbl/Mueller_etal_2023_HPEsCC_AcceptedManuscript.pdf?rlkey=omee4utrb9nr701wrix8lzyb3&dl=0) Müller, S. K., Caillaud, C., Chan, S., De Vries, H., Bastin, S., Berthou, S., … & Warrach-Sagi, K. (2022). Evaluation of Alpine-Mediterranean precipitation events in convection-permitting regional climate models using a set of tracking algorithms. (https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/5th94rw425kwm2nbtbo3q/Mueller_etal_2022_TrackEva_ModelInterC.pdf?rlkey=uajdehsntwm55wcfdow4g5no0&dl=0). Climate Dynamics, 1-19. Coppola, E., Raffaele, F., Giorgi, F.
